verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are they that <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> while he <S%H5750>yet<s%> kept himself <S%H6113>close<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish:<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> were among the mighty <S%H1368>men,<s%> <S%H5826>helpers<s%> of the <S%H4421>war.<s%>

They were <S%H5401>armed<s%> with <S%H7198>bows,<s%> and could use both the right <S%H3231>hand<s%> and the <S%H8041>left<s%> in hurling <S%H68>stones<s%> and shooting <S%H2671>arrows<s%> out of a <S%H7198>bow,<s%> even of Saul's <S%H4480>brethren<s%> <S%H251><s%> <S%H7586><s%> of <S%H4480>Benjamin.<s%> <S%H1144><s%>

The <S%H7218>chief<s%> was <S%H295>Ahiezer,<s%> then <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8094>Shemaah<s%> the <S%H1395>Gibeathite;<s%> and <S%H3149>Jeziel,<s%> and <S%H6404>Pelet,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5820>Azmaveth;<s%> and <S%H1294>Berachah,<s%> and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H6069>Antothite,<s%>

And <S%H3460>Ismaiah<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonite,<s%> a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> among the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty;<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H3166>Jahaziel,<s%> and <S%H3110>Johanan,<s%> and <S%H3107>Josabad<s%> the <S%H1452>Gederathite,<s%>
Eluzai, <S%H498><s%> and <S%H3406>Jerimoth,<s%> and <S%H1183>Bealiah,<s%> and <S%H8114>Shemariah,<s%> and <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H2741>Haruphite,<s%>
Elkanah, <S%H511><s%> and <S%H3449>Jesiah,<s%> and <S%H5832>Azareel,<s%> and <S%H3134>Joezer,<s%> and <S%H3434>Jashobeam,<s%> the <S%H7145>Korhites,<s%>
And <S%H3132>Joelah,<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H1446>Gedor.<s%>

And <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> there separated <S%H914>themselves<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> into the <S%H4679>hold<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>might,<s%> and <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> fit for the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that could <S%H6186>handle<s%> <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H7420>buckler,<s%> whose <S%H6440>faces<s%> were like the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of <S%H738>lions,<s%> and were as <S%H4116>swift<s%> as the <S%H6643>roes<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%>
Ezer <S%H5829><s%> the <S%H7218>first,<s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%>
Mishmannah <S%H4925><s%> the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth,<s%>
Attai <S%H6262><s%> the <S%H8345>sixth,<s%> <S%H447>Eliel<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh,<s%>
Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the <S%H8066>eighth,<s%> <S%H443>Elzabad<s%> the <S%H8671>ninth,<s%>
Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the <S%H6224>tenth,<s%> <S%H4344>Machbanai<s%> the <S%H6249>eleventh.<s%> <S%H6240><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>host:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H6996>least<s%> was over a <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> over a <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> went <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> when <S%H1931>it<s%> had <S%H4390>overflown<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1428>banks;<s%> and they put to <S%H1272>flight<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them of the <S%H6010>valleys,<s%> both toward the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and toward the <S%H4628>west.<s%>
And there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H4679>hold<s%> unto <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6440>meet<s%> them, and <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H518>If<s%> ye be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me to <S%H5826>help<s%> me, mine <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3162>knit<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> you: but <S%H518>if<s%> ye be come to <S%H7411>betray<s%> me to mine <S%H6862>enemies,<s%> seeing there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2555>wrong<s%> in mine <S%H3709>hands,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> thereon, and <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> it.

Then the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> came <S%H3847>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6022>Amasai,<s%> who was <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7991>captains,<s%> and he said, Thine are we, <S%H1732>David,<s%> and on thy <S%H5973>side,<s%> thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse:<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> be unto thee, and <S%H7965>peace<s%> be to thine <S%H5826>helpers;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5826>helpeth<s%> thee. Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6901>received<s%> them, and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H1416>band.<s%>

And there <S%H5307>fell<s%> some <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> when he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H4421>battle:<s%> but they <S%H5826>helped<s%> them <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> upon <S%H6098>advisement<s%> sent him <S%H7971>away,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> He will <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the jeopardy of our <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

As he <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> there <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> him of <S%H4480>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H4519><s%> <S%H5734>Adnah,<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> and <S%H3043>Jediael,<s%> and <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> and <S%H453>Elihu,<s%> and <S%H6769>Zilthai,<s%> <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

And <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5973><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1416>band<s%> of the rovers: <S%H3588>for<s%> they were <S%H3605>all<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> in the <S%H6635>host.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> him, <S%H5704>until<s%> it was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4264>host,<s%> like the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4557>numbers<s%> of the <S%H7218>bands<s%> that were ready <S%H2502>armed<s%> to the <S%H6635>war,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> to <S%H5437>turn<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him, according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H7420>spear<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> ready <S%H2502>armed<s%> to the <S%H6635>war.<s%>

Of <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%> for the <S%H6635>war,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and one <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
Of <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
And <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> was the <S%H5057>leader<s%> of the <S%H175>Aaronites,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred;<s%>

And <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> a young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and of his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>captains.<s%>

And <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> the <S%H251>kindred<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand:<s%> for <S%H5704>hitherto<s%> <S%H2008><s%> the greatest <S%H4768>part<s%> of them had <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>ward<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

And <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H376>famous<s%> <S%H8034><s%> throughout the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>half<s%> <S%H2677><s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5344>expressed<s%> by <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> and make David <S%H4427>king.<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732><s%>

And of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> which were men that <S%H3045>had<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> of the <S%H6256>times,<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> ought to <S%H6213>do;<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of them were two <S%H3967>hundred;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> were <S%H5921>at<s%> their <S%H6310>commandment.<s%>

Of <S%H4480>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H2074><s%> such as went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>battle,<s%> <S%H6186>expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> which could keep <S%H5737>rank:<s%> they were <S%H3808>not<s%> of double <S%H3820>heart.<s%> <S%H3820><s%>

And of <S%H4480>Naphtali<s%> <S%H5321><s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8269>captains,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> them with <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>
And <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1839>Danites<s%> <S%H6186>expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
And of <S%H4480>Asher,<s%> <S%H836><s%> such as went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>battle,<s%> <S%H6186>expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And on the other <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5676><s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> with all <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> that could <S%H5737>keep<s%> <S%H4634>rank,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> to make David <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>rest<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> to make David <S%H4427>king.<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732><s%>

And <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for them.

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> they that were <S%H7138>nigh<s%> <S%H413><s%> them, even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> on <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and on <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and on <S%H6505>mules,<s%> and on <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H3978>meat,<s%> <S%H7058>meal,<s%> cakes of <S%H1690>figs,<s%> and bunches of <S%H6778>raisins,<s%> and <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> there was <S%H8057>joy<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
